I ordered a replacement SIM and picked an option to deliver in 24 hr but I got it back after 3 of which were working days.. Apparently, I was not told there was processing time before shipping it. If I knew it would take so long I would have not paid the extra money for shipping.UPDATE - Tello refunded expedited shipping fees. Changing stars to 3 from 2
Reception is very intermittant .  Otherwise audio is clear.

Review.Titre: I sometimes get poor audio connection…
Review.Contenu: I sometimes get poor audio connection with dropouts, dropped calls upon answering or "not registered on the network" errors when I first make a call.  Don't know if its the local T-Mobile service in my area, Tello account, or my phone but I have changed the phone and problems have generally continued.  May change the service next to see if it resolves.

Review.Titre: I was traveling to Corpus Christi from…
Review.Contenu: I was traveling to Corpus Christi from north Texas and my service enroute, and at destination was not good. It was very frustrating as I needed my phone for work purposes.I did like that you sent me a text message when I had been running too much data using maps as a warning.

Review.Titre: Tello does not offer a cruise ship…
Review.Contenu: Tello does not offer a cruise ship service.

Review.Titre: We no have coverage in Mexico

Review.Contenu: I am disappointed that, since Tello switched to TMobile from Sprint, I seem to have less geographic coverage than before and there are periods of time when I get notices that my voice service is being turned off by my carrier.  Also, my father's experience with Tello customer service has been awful. His phone purchased from Tello always said that most of his calls were roaming.  At first, customer service said the problem wasn't a problem.  After it got worse they said, oh it's a problem all right but now it's out of warranty.

Review.Titre: I've enjoyed Tello and it's extremely…
Review.Contenu: I've enjoyed Tello and it's extremely affordable data plans for years. But coverage has gotten worse. Frequently calls drop or the caller and I can't hear each other on a call from my own house. Will likely switch service soon

Review.Titre: It is way too expensive for data
Tell has been great so far
Review.Contenu: Tell has been great so far! The sreception has been mostly consistent. Honestly, my Tello phone plan was more worth it when I had the two dollars off deal, which brought it down to about eight dollars a month. That only lasted six months, and then they bumped it back up. Currently, I am looking for a new phone plan, as there are many alternatives that offer more data for about the same price I’m currently paying.

I've been a Tello customer for 4-5 years and always thought it was an excellent service. But since late last year, the cell reception has become just awful. I have absolutely no 3G internet on my phone anymore, and not being able to access basic things like Google Maps when I'm out travelling has left me in several tough situations in recent months. I know the Sprint-Tmobile merger was supposed to increase our signal strength, but personally it's had the opposite effect for me.

Review.Titre: i got the line to transfer my old…
Review.Contenu: i got the line to transfer my old number from WA. I currently live in IL. You probably know the rest: cannot do. Tello is not flexible with that or the Customer rep did not want to bother.Got a reply frim Tello. They are missing it all together - Tello cannot transfer a number from another state. Can be done only to an area code corresponding to your address.

Review.Titre: Calls and texts ok but not data
Review.Contenu: I signed up for my child a 6-month promo that was claimed to include unlimited texts, unlimited calls, and 2GB data. The data barely works. Every time we went out of the house where there's no wifi available, my child cannot get on internet at all. We tested in the cities where the signal is strong but Tello 2GB data still didn't work. We contacted Tello and did every step like instructed but all was useless. We now use Tello for calls and texts only. This is an affordable plan for a child and we appreciate Tello offers it.

Constant loss of calls.  Disconnects itself from my WiFi.  Being asked to reboot too often.  Was told phone I had no longer being supported, so get different phone and get onboard the new system by Oct. 2021.Just got another notification that I may need to replace my phone again.

Review.Titre: The 2G data speed actually feels like a…
Review.Contenu: The 2G data speed actually feels like a dial-up 56K modem from the old days in actual use. In fact, the confirmed 2G bandwidth test speed is limited to only 56K, which halves the typical 128Kbps 2G speed. You can also confirm it with any speed test websites or apps if in doubt. I hope the company can be more generous in the near future.

Service is inexpensive, a great value overall.  However, it appears that, in order to get that, I need to compromise speed.  Speed often seems slow, and coverage is spotty with large areas with bad or no service.  Also, it takes hours for voice mail to show up.

Two problems I've experienced with Tello:1. At some point I was unable to send messages even though I have a plan with unlimited texts.2. I've bought a phone (refurbished) for my wife and it came in poor condition, with stains and marks on the screen.The customer service is friendly and professional, but the products could be better.

Review.Titre: Customer Service via email not as good as phone
Review.Contenu: The first time I used Tello's customer service via phone it was EXCELLENT.  They helped me port my old number to their system.  Very Smooth.However, when I tried getting some help from customer service via email (twice) I got no response to my questions.

Review.Titre: The first person I delt with in…
Review.Contenu: The first person I delt with in Customer Service didn't explain things well. I asked for a change in Customer Service staff and finally received clear information.

Review.Titre: Weak coverage in many areas of the U.S.
Customer service does not respond to…
Review.Contenu: Customer service does not respond to emails. Still waiting for a response for a question I sent to customer service over a month ago.Update:I reached out via support page on your website in September 2021 and I got a confirmation saying it was submitted. I never got a response so I reached out again in October. The response I eventually got was thorough and helpful, so I’ve revised my review, but don’t gaslight me publicly.

Review.Titre: My service worked out and I had limited…
Review.Contenu: My service worked out and I had limited ability for anything

Up until merger, I have rated Tello 4 or 5 stars. Will discontinue my 4 lines with Tello due to now having zero service at my residence. This is not a reflection on Tello as I'm sure they retained their excellent customer service - just luck of the draw that I lost good phone service. Also, disclaimer -  I do live in a rural area. When I'm in town I seem to have good reception.. just not many places in the county.

it was a bit frustrating, because your site for activation kept saying: 'sign in later' or 'service not available in your area', which i knew is untrue, cuz i already have another fone activated from same address. this was our second family fone switching to new service. first fone was much easier.

Review.Titre: Should Have Left Good Enough Alone
Review.Contenu: Pros: really affordable and customizable!Cons: since they upgraded their network and required customers to purchase 5G phones my phone won't send and receive texts while connected to WIFI. Tello's techs couldn't solve the problem.

It used to be good. But recently they switched from CDMA to GSM network, and the signal became sporadic around my house. Called their tech support, the only suggestion they can give is to reset and reboot my phone, which won't help at all.======Got another phone call from tech support, explained in details. Sprint went belly-up is not their fault. Unfortunately my location only has certain GSM band available which is not supported by my old iPhone 7. Well time to upgrade I guess. Thanks for the info.

Review.Titre: I like Tello but feel trapped when I…
Review.Contenu: I like Tello but feel trapped when I run out of minutes and have none left in case I am in an emergency.  It would be helpful to sound a warning some time during the month to alert customers when fewer than 12 minutes are left for talk time until the next renewal. Thank you.

I have two cdma phones from tello I was offered gsm sims to replace them. One was delivered very fast but the other one was delayed for much longer. Don’t know why but it was frustrating waiting for the second one to arrive. My thoughts are: A.  the second one was not shipped the same time as the first. B. Tello website was not clear if I ordered one or two sims in the beginning.Whatever the reason, I now have both gsm sims and they are working fine.Regards,Richard

Price is very good with features to pick data amounts. Reception is spotty at times and people cant always hear me with their phones (Oshkosh,WI) so I have to hang up and try the call again also opens up other apps on the phone even when I have not opened them. I dont get any service in Lanark by Waupaca when I am there camping. If you dont want to spend a lot on cellphone bills this might be the carrier for you

Review.Titre: Before T-Mobile bought out Sprint the…
Review.Contenu: Before T-Mobile bought out Sprint the service was great.  After the buy out the phone service is terrible.  Most of the time I cannot receive calls along with my text coming late.  I am living in the same exact home I was before the buy out.  I was told that service would be better so far that is not true.

Review.Titre: The first sim card I bought got zero…
Review.Contenu: The first sim card I bought got zero signal and I wasted a lot of money on that service. I later decided to try again, so I activated a second sim and it got better service for some reason. Still, I would not trust this as my main phone as I live in the boonies. I use it for a hotspot only or as a second phone. Reception is spotty here.

Overall, I am satisfied with Tello.  Only problem is with trying to order new free SIM card for my phone. The instructions in the email I received do not match with tabs from website.  I have not ordered a new SIM card because of this.  I guess a phone call is required.

My husband and I have a cell phone which we use very infrequently, e.g. when we leave home to go somewhere, e.g. a road trip, shopping, etc.  We like the Tello plan because it is not expensive for how we use a cell phone. We purchased the flip phone.  It gets the job done but it is big/bulky. Just recently it is starting to fall apart.  A piece of plastic fell off the hinge. We wonder when the rest of the phone will fall apart.  We had a small Virgin Mobile flip phone before which we really, really miss.

Horrible time connecting to the carrier to use the line. Even worse trying to switch SIM cards. It was good for a long time and then started getting crappy about six months ago. Now you HAVE to switch away from CDMA to GSM and I can't get the SIM card they JUST sent to work.

Review.Titre: To save myself the bother of refilling…
Review.Contenu: To save myself the bother of refilling my account frequently I put a lot of money on my pay-as-you-go.  On day 91 Tello confiscated $20.00 that was left on my account, informed me that my phone number would be permanently forfeited, and I would be SOL.  I received no advance warning or notification.  If you deal with Tello, watch your back.

When I signed up, I checked the coverage area for an area I frequently travel to in California.  I checked both locations where I normally stay and it  was determined that there was good coverage.  However, when I traveled there, there was no coverage!  Quite disappointing.

Tello was great at first, but now my phone is losing signal, not sending messages and not working to well at all. Edit: They gave me a call and said my phone wasn't 100% compatible with the plan I had. Grateful they responded and helped me figure out what was wrong

Review.Titre: Maybe this is my fault but bought a…
Review.Contenu: Maybe this is my fault but bought a little sim card thing with them and a plan and like four months later I go to use it and my credit is gone. Had not even activated my phone yet. Kinda not cool, shoulda been alerted my balance would be confiscated if I don't use it fast enough.If u guys see this it would be kinda cool if you can refund my account. It was only $7, but still...

Review.Titre: I like using Tello because it is a prepaid service
Review.Contenu: I like using Tello because it is a prepaid system. However, I thought it would be better in the sense that we can’t receive files within texts unless we use data even though texting is unlimited. Also, I don’t receive texts to groups. I continue using because it is the line of a teen but at this point I can’t swap my line to Tello, unfortunately. Hopefully Tello will win me soon!Thank you for the opportunity to share our experience!

Review.Titre: Actual phone service is pretty good.
Review.Contenu: Actual phone service is pretty good.But the phone I had to buy is ghastly.  I hate it.  After 6 months of use, I can barely make it work and can't do some functions at all.  I asked for help from you once before and got a bunch of cyber gibberish I don't understand.I'm 82 years old and university graduated but I was not born with computer programming pre-loaded in my brain.A better quality phone is highly recommended. When I was travelling, I took this one in to a Tmoble shop in Denver for help.  The agent snorted and handed it back saying to trash it.

Review.Titre: Variable Service.  Mostly great, but occasionally it's kaput.
Review.Contenu: Most of the time it's great!  Low price for the amount of use I give it.  Everything I expect in phone service.However, occasionally, calls just won't go through and/or texts don't download or voicemails download late.  I don't know why.  I've checked for updates at those times, only to receive message that there are no new updates to be installed.

Review.Titre: Finding how to port in the second line…
Review.Contenu: Finding how to port in the second line with phone number that is existing on a different phone/carrier was difficult on the website. Several times it said it was going to you replace the first phone number that I had brought into Tello previously, not just let in the second phone number/line. After several tries I got it to work. Also, the coverage is not as good as what we had with Sprint. We find that about 30% of the time, the calls are dropped at our home. The pricing is great! One call to customer service was good.

Review.Titre: I live in a busy area of a city but the…
Review.Contenu: I live in a busy area of a city but the connection of phone calls from time to time is poor, fuzzy, which is very disappointing. When it works it works greatly. I have two phones, each using different provider. I have been thinking of stay with another company permanently.

Review.Titre: Free worldwide calling and cheap price
Review.Contenu: Tello Website is user friendly,  free calling to 60 countries, and price plans are really good. But the coverage is not that great. Maybe it is still on the Sprint network. The coverage is poorer than T-Mobile. If they improve the coverage it will be very good.

The customized plan options and pricing are great BUT data is inconsistent. Sometimes it works, sometimes it does not, and that can be a serious problem. Because of this problem, I am thinking about switching.

Mostly good, however there are a few outstanding issues.  During busy hours of the day service can be sporadic.  We live out in a rural area and my wife, who stays home, has had big problems with texts not going out.  Most of her texts do not go through, she has had them stay in the outbox for days and she finally gives up and deletes them.  Voice and texting over the internet would be a great addition to your service!

Despite the promise of 4G LTE, Tello seems only to manage 3G - well, for me anyway. I live in the Washington, DC area where one would expect major cell coverage. My phone is a supported model so I can only assume the issue is at the network coverage end. It's disappointing for an otherwise great company.

Review.Titre: Best to bring your own phone
Review.Contenu: Best to bring your own phone. Issues with my phone in order to be fixed require continous rest, erasing all info, so I rather just keep pulling battery out and replacing in order to use phone. Without reset, phone will always say I have a message fron months ago. Also, Husband lost reception while traveling Montana.Phone just permanently quit after this review. Was leaving for patriot phone anyway, so sooner than later.

Review.Titre: Swapping phones was fairly easy but it…
Review.Contenu: Swapping phones was fairly easy but it took a couple more days than I expected for the SIM card to be shipped to me. Previously, around Thanksgiving, I had called and messaged several times about purchasing a new phone for my kid. I was not able to get any assistance but I am glad I did not buy a new phone anyhow as I just used an old phone I already had. It will do the job. On the bright side, the plan is affordable and works well enough for my kid. Thanks
Unstable signal throughout my region. Called customer service and they were unable to find the problem. Will change back to my old service provider MetroPCS mobile.

Review.Titre: Like Tello service extreme value for…
Review.Contenu: Like Tello service extreme value for the money but when it comes to billing it could be better. I have direct deposit and need to be billed on a certain day when funds are in my account. Tello charges you early before your 30 day plan expires up to 2 days early and then may bill you at 4am when my bank is closed if it does not go thru on the first try you may not have service until you log in and try to re submit your payment they should give you a 3-5 day grace period like other businesses do you can sign up for e-mail notification so they will e-mail you 48 hours before payment is attempted but that does not help much if their charging you before your plan expires.

Review.Titre: I paid for another month of service to…
Review.Contenu: I paid for another month of service to find out that the SIM card doesn't work with my Samsung S9+. I have to buy another SIM because the one I have from them and was using in my other phone is not compatible. Otherwise great value and customer service. I just wish there was more flexibility when switching phones.

Review.Titre: Web site is terrific but actual cell service is POOR
Review.Contenu: Web site is terrific, 'DASHBOARD' and 'ACTIVITY' pages are super helpful and informative BUT actual cell service is POOR.  Works great from my home in Manchester NH but just three miles north (but still in Manchester NH) no service at all.  Very disappointing, will have to cancel an move to a different provider!!!

I recently traveled to Canada and I did not have an internet connection. I had a very hard time finding places in Canada. Overall better than other MVNOs; good price and customer service but you will have a hard time if you travel abroad like Canada. If Tello had roaming service, it would definitely deserve 6 stars!!

The service has been better than Republic Wireless with one major exception, the lack of CONDITIONAL CALL FORWARDING. This is a feature that just about every carrier provides and is a real necessity for those that wish to have Google Voice handle voice messages and transcriptions (Google does it very well).  The request has been made numerous times to Tello with no response.  Is it a deal-breaker?  Close enough to consider going back to Republic Wireless.  Otherwise, the service has been pretty good.

The phone provided is pretty bad. We had one occasion where the service did not work even though it had worked in that spot before. We just use it for the kids when they need a phone while out of the house or if we are gone we can contact the kids at home. The price is amazing, so we will keep using it.

Review.Titre: Nice customer service people, but a couple of other problems
Review.Contenu: The customer service people are very nice, but there have been a few issues:  (1) All our 3G devices got forced offline due to a Sprint network update on August 1, 2019.  Tello was unable to correct this, so we ended up spending $200+ buying all new equipment.   (2) When the customer service line is overloaded, it pushes you off to voicemail.  There have been times where I've been on hold for several minutes and been pushed to voicemail.  I call right back and get an agent the second time.

Five stars for the price, two stars for the customer service.  I received assistance from four young Tello technicians; only one of them treated me with dignity and respect.  He was willing to learn the effective way to communicate and provide assistance to a senior citizen.

The cost to use Tello is 5 Star. The pricing is best that I could find.  But their communications skill is not so hot. Chats get cut off. Telephone contact is iffy at best. Trying to buy a telephone and asking questions about them is the impossible dream. Want to use your own phone requires providing numbers you don't have until you buy a new phone. I love 'em, and won't leave 'em , but the price of service is RIGHT! 2 Stars for service and 5 Stars for cost averages a 3 Star rating. Sorry Tello, I really wanted to do better.Fred

Review.Titre: The reason for this service is good but…
Review.Contenu: The reason for this service is good but it is expensive in comparison to other service providers, They also use the T Mobile network. Most probably I will drop their service after a month.

Review.Titre: Tello works find in big cities but…
Review.Contenu: Tello works find in big cities but coverage in more rural areas is terrible compared to my husband who has T-Mobile.  Sometimes I have to turn my phone on and off to get any coverage and even then it can be spotty.

1. Tello has the best service for the price.2. Tello has the best data plans for the price.3. Some of Tello customer service reps are great.My BIGGEST issue with Tello is that their service DOES NOT support Apple iWatch and iPhone as a pair that will allow them to work independent of the other; which means customers have to use other cellular phone services to get that. This is probably costing Tello good business. My advice to Tello: Get with the times before someone else comes up with a way to take ALL your business.

Review.Titre: Price is good but problem voice call.
Review.Contenu: Price is good.  However, a lot of time for voice call with unknow noise even I call back with the same problem.

Better service than my previous provider.  Pure talk who claim to be Veteran driven had poorer service and fraudulently charged me $85 for a phone line I never authorized.  Tello costs less and provides better for this Veteran.
The pricing is great  and commiserate wiht the services provided.  The only gripe I have is the performance of the flip phone which reacts slowly to inputs,

I was using T-Mobile network, being a grad international student, it was really painful and one of my friend suggested me to switch to tello. It's been around 2 years and I'm happy with services. Even I moved out of the NY and traveled Chicago, Ohio, Michigan, North Dakota. Everywhere I received the coverage. I'll highly recommend it to international students.

Review.Titre: Great options for an affordable plan
Review.Contenu: Tello is affordable, user friendly, convenient and very easy to customize your own plans as well as see how much of it you use. The only issues I really have are with not being able to see how much of my plan I'm using until some time later (e.g. the next day or even after), and sometimes that my plan seems to be used up a lot quicker than I am actually using it (which I have difficulty checking due to those belated plan usage updates), so it feels like I have to be hyper vigilant on my usage. But other than those, I haven't had many other problems so I definitely recommend this as a pretty great, reasonably priced phone plan!
Love the service.  However, my voicemail feature is very much delayed to receive a message.  Is it my phone or this service?  Other than that, it’s great…and so reasonable in cost.  Thank you.

When my landline became too expensive to justify a couple of years ago, I ported the number to Tello to primarily still use as a phone that stays at home. For a song, you get unlimited N. America calls and a basic, but adequate, data allotment.The only drawback is that you can't roam the phone abroad, but that is being made clear when you sign up. Also, when they switched network awhile back, I had to buy a new compatible phone on my own dime. But even that was quickly made up by the super-low monthly rate. I would recommend their service to anyone without hesitation.

So flexible and affordable. Trouble-free ordering, timely notification when I'm in danger of bumping up against my chosen limits. Only problem is that I don't get group texts right away sometimes. Sometimes they come in days later. Could be my phone, but I don't think so.

We were moving from T-Mobile and living overseas. New sims were easy to order, activation and porting was very fast.Only thing I think needs improvement is identifying sim cards. I mixed them up by accident and it took me some time to realize I was trying to activate an iphone sim on an Android phone.

Review.Titre: Very good service and very affordable…
Review.Contenu: Very good service and very affordable but there has been a lot of outages lately with them in my area first ine was 9b August 2nd for a few hours the second time lasted 3 days and just had another outage 9n August 30 2023. Its getting ridiculous luckily I have WiFi calling set up

Review.Titre: I almost would give it 5 stsrs if the…
Review.Contenu: I almost would give it 5 stsrs if the bumper porting over was faster. Took couple days where I been to other places and all took couple hours. Other than that T-Mobile it uses and have to say way better than us mobile /verizon or consumer cellular / AT&TService much better overall. So easy to swap phones after that with eSIM literally takes minutes and I done several times. I went to try another service and came back. I  put my wife’s phone now on it  not to mention plans r cheaper than others. Well worth it. Just do it trust me.

SIM shipping was fast. Free and received in 4 days. Others take 7-10 days and I don't get it. Their prices are good. For T-Mobile, I still feel like it's $3-5 dollars too much per month, and I wish the limited plans, i.e. no-very little data and unlimited calling were a bit cheaper.Another gripe is T-Mobile itself. They don't cover half of what others do and their data network "goes down" or "malfunctions" randomly every few days regardless of signal. It's a shame Tello's model doesn't scale to other carriers. With a triopoly dominating I'm sure this doesn't leave as many choices nor wiggle room, but it would be nice to see similar prices and choose other networks.

Tried to give 5 Stars. Tello is always great with its customer service. Almost no wait time and immediate help that’s the best I’ve ever had from any carrier. I LOVE Tello not just because of the price and call quality, but MOST IMPORTANTLY because of the EXCELLENT customer service. Thank you, Tello!

It's affordable. The internet speed is acceptable, however I have to switch to LTE as it unable to switch to different antennas automatically when on 5G. I have never had an issue with its network coverage. I have an unlimited data plan which is capped at 25GB. When you reach the cap, it becomes unusable so you have to renew your plan. Also, on unlimited plans you cannot keep track of your usage unless you rely on your phone's data usage report.

Review.Titre: Mint Mobile user switched to Tello
Review.Contenu: I switched over to Tello from Mint Mobile after running into issues with delays or not receiving my SMS text at random times.  So far that has not been an issue on Tello for about a year now.I give Tello 4 out of 5 stars because for iPhone users we do not get a 5G network.  Also, the website and mobile app UI / UX design could be improved for better user experience.

Review.Titre: I have better reception now at home and…
Review.Contenu: I have better reception now at home and at work! All good, with the exception of my music. My Spotify app seems to stop more often now than it did before. I'm hoping that's not going to be the norm.

The plans are very customizable, I can choose how much data and minutes I want and the prices probably the best if you don't use a lot. You can use their app or website to manage your account and I love the fact that the website isn't a bloated slow mess like most websites these days. I won't give a full 5 stars because I had problems where calls wouldn't work but don't know if its because of my old phone or tello.

For the most part, tello has served my wife and I well. We do, on occasion, experience dropped calls while using wifi calling. The only other thing that's a little bothersome would be the fact that tello rolls data to zero if not renewed before the end of the pay cycle. How nice it would be if we diddn't have to worry about losing our saved data every month.

Have used Visible, Mint Mobile, and almost AT&T Prepaid before reading their reviews.So far TELLO is working well. Occasional slow data speeds/connectivity where phone needs to be toggled to airplane mode. Visible had better data connection, but I like TELLO's flexibility in plan pricing.Haven't needed to call customer service yet.

Review.Titre: Save on great cell phone service
Review.Contenu: Signed up two years ago 4 people in my household, everybody is very happy with the service AND the pricing. Easy to deal with when it comes to helpdesk, ask for Juan. Wish they could send the voicemails as text emails to my inbox. (Most VOIP phone companies do this) Apart from that, I highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Good price, but 4G mobile data speeds is slower than Tracfone in my area
Review.Contenu: UPDATE: Tello technical support was helpful and easy to work with, and call quality after our support session is good, although mobile data speeds have stayed the same slow 1.4 Mbps download (half Tracfone in my area). The support technician guided me in adding a custom mobile network entry (APN wholesale, MMSC domain name wholesale.mmsmvno.com, ask Tello for the remaining settings).ORIGINAL REVIEW, BEFORE TELLO SUPPORT CALL:Tello is an excellent price, but with my 4G cell phone call quality is poor and data speed is slower than expected in my neighborhood (I get 1.4 Mbps download speed), making online shopping painfully slow. Tracfone is delivering double the data speed (2.7 Mbps download) and better service overall in my town. But the price of Tello is much lower than Tracfone, especially with its plan flexibility, and WiFi calling vastly improves call quality at home, so its functional for me. Also, the "My Tello" app is more reliable than the Tracfone "My Account" app for checking balance and changing the plan.

As stated in some previous Tello Surveys, I have been with Tello for a number of years now and I love their service, which is why service for my Apple iPad Pro and Mini is covered by them; but I also have an Apple XR and an iWatch 8 that I would LOVE to be covered by Tello as well, but Tello seems to move at a cave man’s paste to make that service available to it’s customers. Come on Tello, it’s your loss, it’s a new day, GET WITH IT!  What’s taking so long?

Review.Titre: A confusing web site Activation process
Review.Contenu: Very responsive Customer Service.  I had some difficulty following the web site directions.  They were clear enough, just not very prominent.  Anyway, after I  achieved my SIM in the mail, I went to the the web site and began the activation process, I followed the directions as outlined above but then I had to pay again for another Plan.  I must have made a mistake, I kept waiting for acknowledgement of having paid for a Plan, but it never showed and I had to purchase another plan.

Review.Titre: Tello works great for my family
Review.Contenu: Tello works great for my family. It's cheap, affordable and reliable most of the time. The only thing I could wish for as a customer -Renewing the plan every month does a mobile data reset and makes a fresh start which could be improved by carry forwording it for next cycle. To me Tello will be the BEST network if they do consider the above request.

Review.Titre: I switched to tello over a year ago…
Review.Contenu: I switched to tello over a year ago after having my previous carrier for about 7 years.  I am very happy with the service and the price can't be beat!  Customer service is also very good.

Great service. Easy to change plan and prices are sweet.Only two inconveniences really. These aren't deal breakers by any means and I still highly recommend the service.First, the coverage can lack in some areas. By comparison a friend who has ATT won't lose service in more remote areas while I will.Second, if you buy one plan then decide to upgrade part way through, you have to buy the complete new plan not just pay the difference.For example, you buy a [1gb $10] plan but then decide to get [unlimited $30] plan a couple days later.Instead of charging you $20 to upgrade, you pay the full $30.Not a big issue and not something that effects the quality of service.Just wanted to say incase someone else was curious.TLDR: Great service, minor coverage issue (i.e. wooded/remote areas), let your gb balance run out before upgrading/downgrading.

Review.Titre: Port-In Nightmare / Cannot Get a Resolution
Review.Contenu: *Update*I did receive a response from Tello and my issue appears to be resolved. I don't like leaving reviews like this but thankfully Tello takes customer feedback seriously. I'd like to revise my original review because it appears Tello was NOT at fault for the glitch that caused my service interruption. Thanks to the support staff and technicians for getting my service restored.---Original Review---At the time of this review, it's been 6 days of not having service following my port into Tello mobile. I am literally not receiving calls or texts to my number.I've been contacting support everyday and just cannot get anything more than "we sill send it to technical support." Six days and they have not figured out why my line is not working.I hate leaving bad reviews but after 6 days, I have to. The only thing I can do is hope someone is actually trying to resolve my issue. Being helpless and without my phone number is a gut blow.Hopefully at some point, I get my number working but now that this is approaching a week, I have little to no optimism. Just don't lose my number. I have MFA logins attached to it for receiving codes. I cannot lose my number because of Tello/T-Mobile.

I love you guys! Thank you for providing very affordable service and allowing me to have two phone numbers on my cell phone (my former landline and my cell phone number). I wish I could get better service out here in the country. It’s fine outside but once I go inside it gets sketchy.That has to do with the number of towers available and I don’t think you have anything to do with that.Oh, your customer service on the phone is friendly and prompt. Thanks again.

Review.Titre: Staying with me to assure that the…
Review.Contenu: Staying with me to assure that the numbers transferred to Tello.

Honestly speaking,tello helps me a lot to reach all in a moment globally.I would appreciate if tello provides incoming call in it's app as well as extend the validity of sim,so long the user desires.Thanks tello for it's performances.

Customer Service is prompt and responsive. However, they have been unable to port-in three landline numbers, from the AT&T network. My current thoughts are to leave Tello service after only two weeks.

Review.Titre: Great price for custom plans but no roaming
Review.Contenu: Tello is has great prices on plans that you can customize so that you buy only what you need.The website is easy to use and phone number transfer happened within minutes of my request.The only thing missing is roaming option. Right now, the only option is to use the phone over wifi while abroad. I wouldn't mind paying $5 to activate this for a month for example.

Review.Titre: The payment gateway was faulty which…
Review.Contenu: The payment gateway was faulty which resulted in me getting multiple sims (and credit card charges). However, the support was awesome, as soon as I reached out to them, they helped revert the money, and fix the multiple sims problem.

Review.Titre: The customer representatives were most… friendly, and almost there
Review.Contenu: The customer representatives were most friendly, thorough and professional. There needs to be some improvement for blind and visually impaired customers. Namely, that the customer service personnel have the ability to, with the customers permission, see you their screen so that they can pinpoint things like QR codes. That would greatly short in tThe customer representatives were most friendly, thorough and professional. There needs to be some improvement for blind and visually impaired customers. Namely, that the customer service personnel have the ability to, with the customers permission, see if there’s screen so that they can pinpoint things like QR codes. That would greatly shorten the process of tasks Such as installing eSIM. Thank you for caring business team that helps us customers walk through various tasks.

Review.Titre: It's a good value for me (with a dumb…
Review.Contenu: It's a good value for me (with a dumb phone) since I don't need very much mobile service. It's also easy to order, and change the level of service every month. The problem has been, is there are times the voice connection doesn't work, but I can use text. Then sometimes text doesn't send right away, even tho there's a connection. And this is where other (non tello) phone plans work ok. But in general it's a good deal.

Review.Titre: I wish the unlimited plans were really unlimited in speed.
Review.Contenu: I wish the unlimited plan and other plans would keep the 5/4 Gb until the end of the plan without limitations.$ 29 dollar plan for unlimited it's still expensive.  Inviting a frend and getting the credit did not happen because the app is confusing.
Inexpensive, easy to subscribe and organized, Tello is a great deal.  However, the 5G reception can be spotty and needing to turn on cellular mode isn’t convenient.

I have tello. You need o be careful., Virtual voicemail is not compatible with Tello and tell also makes your ported number 11 digits not 10 by adding a 1 in front of your number. That makes your name not show up and seem like spam. After i ported My number I called my mom My number showed but was 11 digits and her phone marked it as spam

Review.Titre: never had any problem with usage of…
Review.Contenu: never had any problem with usage of Tello.  Has always performed as it should.  I've have used Tello for 2-3 years.I have to admit that your selections of phones to sell is not very good.

Review.Titre: I love the inexpensive service and the…
Review.Contenu: I love the inexpensive service and the the taxes and fees are SO low.  The cost is worth the service.  I am not impressed with the data as it is really slow all the time and very spotty.  I also feel like some months I lose a day of service and am charged on a 30-day cycle or something.  But for the price it is worth it and I won't be changing anytime soon.

Very good service for price. Only issue is that when I am using wifi calling abroad is that I need to use some kind of proxy else service does not work, only emergency calls.Edit: changing dns to 8. 8. 8. 8 does the job. Thank you.
I love the price, the coverage is pretty good, if I get up in any mountainous area I have no coverage and for that I am giving four stars instead of five
creating an account is difficult, but after that it has been smooth and best price around for our minimal use. We have two phones and are 73.

Review.Titre: It was very easy to use the eSIM
Review.Contenu: It was very easy to use the eSIM. Easy to switch back and it also was very easy to renew. All around a good experience.

Review.Titre: I never really had a problem with Tello…

I have been pleased with Tello service. I have talked to customer service several times. The connect was fast and the problems were solved. I will contine to use Tello.

Review.Titre: If you want a cheap phone bill It's…

I really enjoy all the possibilities that Tello offers to me. The way Tello always reminds on my availability in terms of megabytes left and other things. Review.Titre: The coverage in Philadelphia and New…
Review.Contenu: The coverage in Philadelphia and New Jersey is not great when it comes to data. It might just be my phone, but apps often don't work on data.

Review.Titre: I would like to be able to carryover…

Review.Titre: I get great value for the price
Review.Contenu: I get great value for the price - My use is low enough to make a $10 cell phone perfect. Easy to maintain service with the set it and forget it plan ..
Love the price and service, please provide home wifi internet so I can buy it.

Review.Titre: Pricing and quality of calls are solid
Review.Contenu: Pricing and quality of calls are solid. I wish the 2g internet was faster and international calls from us to Europe would not show Random numbers on receivers' phone
I have not had any signifocant issues. The only problem I have had is minor issues relating to finding specific information about my data usage.
The service is good & affordable.Minus 1 star for the price & lack of selection of phones.

Review.Titre: They offer a pretty good eSim service…
Review.Contenu: They offer a pretty good eSim service for a fairly fair price. So far it has worked fine for everything I've needed to do.

Review.Titre: I am so glad I took the chance and joined Tello!
Review.Contenu: I joined Tello around 03/06/23. I almost wish I had known more about Tello a while ago. I have always had a flip phone and that is still the type I carry with me. I also recently got my first and last smartphone (forced into it). I rarely ever turn it on or even look at it, but the problem was that I could not get a data plan for it through my previous carrier (T-Mobile). It wasn't that they did not offer it is that they only have one plan and it is far more than I need and unaffordable. The bigger offense was that they lied to me for two months making all kinds of promises that I later found out were completely false (not only customer reps, but supervisors as well)! I only needed 1 GB of data and though it would be nice to have both phones with one carrier, but I can't afford $65 per month for something I will never use.I was very skeptical of Tello, thinking it was a fly by night scam or something, but I needed to leave T-mobile (who no longer has good customer service) mostly for the lies. I decided to take a chance with Tello for both phones. (I now understand what Tello is better). I am not used to DIY for cell phones and was scared I would mess things up setting up service with Tello, but the customer service is amazing! From before service to setting up, I was able to get someone on the phone almost immediately and every question was answered. Not only did I get set up, but I even ported my number, which happened in record time (after I threatened T-mobile, who were being uncooperative, by citing chapter and verse of the law regulating mobile services). Once I got what I needed, Tello ported my number in less than an hour!I now have a custom plan (love that) and paying half what I was for my flip phone coverage and getting more than I had with T-mobile directly! I opted for one sim chip that I will switch back and forth between the two phones as needed, which won't be much. (I only need data for places without Wi-Fi and I'm rarely in that situation).  To date, the service has been fantastic! I think this is really the way to go.
Good coverage, cheap price, what more could you want.

Review.Titre: It's very much a value for the price
Review.Contenu: It's very much a value for the price. The only problem I have had is that I upped my data allowance. Now that I don't need that amount of data, I am not sure how to down the amount.

Review.Titre: Phone service has bad reception in my…
Review.Contenu: Phone service gets bad reception in my home. I have to go to my garage to make sure that I do not have "dropped" calls. This has been happening almost daily since you switched to T-mobile.
OK. Cheap service. Economy phone line. Lifeline type.

Review.Titre: I have had Tello service for both of my…
Review.Contenu: I have had Tello service for both of my phone lines for a year.  I am very, very pleased with both the price and the coverage, with the exception that there is no service in limited areas of southern New Hampshire when I have made brief visits there - but then the silence is not all bad.  No problems as all in Chicago.

Review.Titre: I'm very pleased with the Tello…
Review.Contenu: I'm very pleased with the Tello service.I did experience a puzzeling thing. I was viewing live TV and had 3.5 gigs on my plan left. after about 45 mins. all of the data was used up. Can you explain why? In the past , 1 hour of video used up about a gig. Last week I was camping at High Falls State Park in Geogia. Just North of Macon and 1/2 mile off of I-75. I had no service at all,  but everyone around me ,including my wife who has verizon service was using their phones. That was disappointing. Is this going to be an ongoing problem? Over all my experience has been good.

Review.Titre: The agent gave me the detail of my data…
Review.Contenu: The agent gave me the detail of my data usage. Good service.

Review.Contenu: Phone service so so but internet connection poor,

Having trouble with wife's phone. The tech people worked with me back and forth over several days before reaching a correct conclusion. They were courteous, persistent and professional. Been with Tello for a number of years and definitely recommend to friends.

Review.Titre: Tello service is honest and affordable
Review.Contenu: Tello service is honest and affordable.  There are numerous options of plans for a variety of users.  I have been using Tello for three months now and appreciate it for what it's worth.     Out of state phone calls are sometimes difficult indoors, which I hope improves with time.  Overall, Tello is a good service with a high recommendation.  Their plans are easy to set up which is a bonus, and the price is exceptional.

I have had one other event s few months ago where tello stopped working for an evening. No hotspot for internet. Mintsim also not working, so that may have been tmobile? down. Worked the next day.This event. tello hotspot stopped working in the evening. Mintsim worked ok, so this says that tello was down. Tello worked again the next day.Tello has been pretty reliable, but when it goes down it takes a lot of time to try to determine whether the problem is my computer, tello, or whatever. Kind of frustrating.Another frustration is that I was thinking about getting a new phone (samsung a23 5g). Tello can't tell me if it will work without an imei. I don't have an imei because I haven't bought the phone yet.

The responses to my questions are prompt and thorough. But I'm still having some issue between 2 different accounts because they involve Apple phones. Also my cell reception goes in and out on one of them even tho they are right beside each other. But saving 120 bucks a month is more important than this problem.

I love how affordable Tello plans are and that they even allow you to keep your phone number when you switch. The customer service is also pretty good I must say. Service can be a bit spotty at times which is why I'm only giving a 4/5 star review.

Review.Titre: When i needed to call it was always…
Review.Contenu: When i needed to call it was always availiable

Review.Titre: It is cheap phone service but seems to…

Review.Contenu: Good experience getting my son’s phone number changed. A little difficult getting the email process figured out, but once we got the ball rolling it was fairly prompt. Not bad service for a discount mobile service provider.
Customizable Service. Good network. Recycled phone numbers is a downside.
It was easy to upgrade. I would've given 5 stars if there had been an easy way to switch plans without changing the payment date.
Customer service was spot on. Very satisfied

The phone plan price is cheap, and I have been using it. Since the company changed a new SIM card.I often cannot receive calls from friends, and sometimes the messages are received after more than 30 minutes.  I contacted the customer service, and he asked me to take out the sim card and clean it. I did it, and I could receive the information immediately, but the future information could not be received again.  Hope the company improves it.

Review.Titre: The rates are great and ordering is…
Review.Contenu: The rates are great and ordering is simple.
Great price! However, my phone couldn't detect the SIM card after about a month, so I switched to ESIM. Possibly Tello adding ESIM did something to existing SIM cards?

Review.Titre: I think the world needs Tello!
Review.Contenu: Value for price is excellent. My limited contact with the support team has been mixed, one person who was obviously in the wrong job and others who were excellent. With the Tmobile takeover, I had the unpleasant experience of replacing a recently purchased phone with slightly weaker signals in my home area, but now we can easily call some of my friends in Europe. Overall, I am happy but not effusive.

Customer service reps. have been really great! I'm, also, pleased with the coverage. >My only complaint is that I've called 3X asking for the previous owner's name to be removed from the number that is now mine.  Having someone else's name show on caller id has caused me to not reach people.  I was stuck at the airport for 2 1/2 hrs. As a senior in my 70's, this was scary.  No one would answer a call from a name they did not recognize: Victoria Yadd....  If the previous name can be removed, I'll raise my 4* rating to 5*.                     Thanks,  DFO

After an internet search, we decided that as retired seniors on a small fixed income, Tello was the way to go. Our, son, who is early in his career and still on our plan, was happy to hear that the T mobile network is utilized. He only uses his phone fr calls and texts.We had good customer service experience. There was an initial misunderstanding but it was handled well and sorted out. {Thank you Eric for your patience and help).The new phone appears to work well and it was easy to set up and transfer information following Tello instructions. Here's hoping fr continued great service and ease of use. Thanks Tello. Carole & Wade Nasholds

Review.Titre: Very competitively priced plans, some inflexibility in plan management.
Review.Contenu: Very competitively priced plans. I didn't expereince poor connection in my area, but I haven't tried using Tello outside of a well-covered urban area. Generally, I'm happy with the price-quality ratio. Negatives: minimum amounts for "pay as you go" credits are too high ($20) and this credit only lasts limited time (3 months?). Also, Tello's system of plan change is weirdly inflexible: there is no scheduled plan change, any plan change is immediate.

The price is great! I love that you can pay for only what you need. My issue is sometimes texts don't come in a reasonable amount of time. Usually it's within a minute, but sometimes it takes 5-30 mins to get texts. Pics and GIFs also don't like to send unless they're under 300 kb, and sometimes not even then. Other times I can send a 1.2 MB pic and it sends almost immediately. It doesn't seem to matter whether data is on or off, it's not consistent. Ultimately it gets the important jobs done.

Review.Titre: Now I could recommend using Tello.
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed with their service at the beginning. The data didn't work. They fix and now is working great (even better than before). Now I could recommend using Tello.

I pay $30 a month for 2 cell phones unlimited talk and text with 2gb of data, which I'll admit is not a lot but I'm also not glued to my phone so it's enough for what I do. Don't know any other company where I can get a deal like this, reception is fine and speeds are decent. Not stellar service but for what I pay it's good.

Service from phone staff is great, they really help with your questions. Rates are great with many plans to choose from.  A lot of Canadians travel to the USA for 5 to 6 months, only need Tello plan while they are there in USA.  Why not allow them to purchase a Sim and send to Canada before they head to USA so when they hit the USA border they can activate their Sim and phone with Tello.

Decent service and coverage - reliable. Your data is capped (of course) and you WILL feel it when they cut you back. Tech support is generally helpful and accurate. My phone does not handle updates very well and I have experienced issues with the APN on one occasion (that could be the phone itself though). Very affordable! The product and service you receive are well worth the price!

Review.Titre: I have been with tello for a few months…
Review.Contenu: I have been with tello for a few months now and NOT had any issues and very satisfied.The only issue I have is that if I change my service every month I keep my old minutes, data and text time. If I keep my old plan I lose all items and start over.You should have some type of plan where if I don’t use all minutes, data, etc. some or all minutes, dat text roll over to the following month.Just a thoughtThanks

Tello is a magnificent service.  It offers several different plans at very affordable rates.  It meets my needs perfectly.  Its site is easy to navigate.The only negative in my book is that Tello does not allow minutes and data to roll over to the next month if a person ops for auto monthly renewal.  Other phone companies do allow this, so it is not a matter of technology.

Review.Titre: I don't use my phone everyday nor do I…
Review.Contenu: I don't use my phone everyday nor do I check my text messages could have used more than 24 hours when my card was discovered was hacked and had to be canceled and had to get a new card maybe even a phone call and would have cut through a lot of the red tape

Review.Titre: Great price Great data for my needs

Review.Contenu: Paola Lopez made my customer service experience GREAT. Why? She addresses issues with kindness, competency, and efficiency. My issue surrounded porting my phone to another service and yet, Paola still provided superior service. Superior because the current provider I'm being forced to use is the exact opposite. I'll be switching back to Tello as soon as I'm able.

I called Tello today 12/18/2023 about my SMS not working within 10 mins the help desk had it working thank you.  I have never had bad customer service from Tello, I was with Straight Talk and switched because of their bad customer service. Please let your employees know how important they are this will keep good people.

I love that their plans are very affordable and they also give you internet which is very nice. The new saving era is so amazing and i’m happy that they provide esim and physical card because esim was the reason why i joined tello. I will continue to use tello mobile and share it with others to show them how great it is. I appreciate Tello Mobile and i’m rooting for them! Have a wonderful day! :)

Review.Titre: Renew early to roll over data
Review.Contenu: Easy to renew... I  renew a day early as then Tello will roll over my remaining data... this is a wonderful deal! Tello reminds me 48 hours before renewal so that I  can renew and roll over my minutes.

Review.Titre: Wonderful help from really kind and nice people.
Review.Contenu: All of the phone representatives are very patient, informative and courteous. It is so refreshing to talk to real humans who really care and go above ordinary customer service and customer support. I truly respect your 24 hour staff.

We have an expectation that technology becomes less expensive over time. What is unusual is for a technology company to pass those saving on to existing customers. Thank you Tello for the free service upgrade!

I love everything about Tello!  Whoever the web site developer is definitely knows what they are doing.  Plenty of explanations in common language that tells you what everything is, what it means, and how to use it.  Everything on the web site is SO EASY!!   Not to mention, the service itself is clear and clean.  I'm in the process of changing all our phones over to Tello.Just one suggestion to web developer.... When porting your current phone number in, The PIN input should explain that it is your password/pin you use when logging into the carrier you are porting from.
Nothing but praise for Tello. Have used it for years and have not had one problem with it. Service is great.They have even given more than I had realized I was entitled to. It's a wonderful service.

Our family loves Tello. We each pay around ~10/month for our cell phone service (depending on the data plan). It is reliable and covers most areas, so we don't have issues with dropped calls. You just need to use a phone that works with their service. Tello sells the phones, but (FYI) we found better deals on the manufacturer's website.
Dashboard has all info. necessary for payment process easy. Simple step to pay and change plan.

When I misplaced my phone, I went to the Tello site to block the number. A few weeks later, I found the phone. The website said I had to email customer service to unblock the number. I sent the email and got a reply 6 minutes later! They unblocked my phone and I was good to go. I was amazed at how fast they solved the problem. Wow!

Review.Titre: Outstanding Customer Service w personal follow-up
Review.Contenu: Tello is a unique company in that their customer service  reps really do their job. Every time I have called, they have answered my questions thoroughly and even gone above and beyond with personally typed out emails providing instructions. Also, VERY VERY important is that they are not an off shore phone bank of foreigners parroting predetermined responses, but rather they have service reps that are native English speakers or if foreign born, their accents are not too heavy. Very reasonably priced plans as well that don't require a contract. Good job Tello!!!

Review.Titre: I had a small issue with Tello…
Review.Contenu: I had a small issue with Tello regarding billing and was surprised at how fast and efficiently they responded to my concern.  Not only did they clearly explain the policy in question, but they also went beyond what I thought necessary to immediately accommodate my request.  The response time was measured in minutes (via email!).  So, kudos to Tello - keep up the good work.

Review.Titre: Tello has been the best cell provider…
Review.Contenu: Tello has been the best cell provider in our experience!  We've used them for 3 years, our friends and family have found them to be awesome too.  Thanks Tello for what you do!

Review.Titre: I have been with Tello mobile for a…
Review.Contenu: I have been with Tello mobile for a couple of months. I started out on $10 plan and moved up to the $14 plan. I ported my landline from AT&T. I have saved a ton of money porting landline toTello Mobile. I would recommend Tello Mobile.

Thank you so much Tello for your incredible and generous gift of data increase and unbelievable price drop for my Unlimited Plan! It was completely unexpected and truly appreciated! It is a blessing to me and my mother in so many ways. I've been with you for over a year now with no issues of any sort. In fact my mother is in need of a new phone and provider and knowing my satisfaction with your company is planning on switching to Tello as soon as possible. Thank you so much! God bless you,and again,thank you!

Review.Titre: Offers everything I need at the lowest…
Review.Contenu: Offers everything I need at the lowest cost and THE reason if you need the cheapest way to be able to text. I tried for 2 years with no texts and it turned out to be very hard. Tello to the rescue and I couldn't be happier. I also like their pay a day or so in advance and you keep all unused data and minutes.

Tello always tells you the whole story-- upfront. No if , ands  or buts. Tello increased my service-- not the price! Tello does not pretend to give services they do not give. Tello web-site is clear and  not filed with extraneous  advertisements for additional services. Tello  reps are always knowledgeable, polite, patient and eager to be helpful. Honesty is the best policy-- and Tello is the best.

Tello works for us. We've been using it for over two years now, and have never had a problem. We travel up and down the East Coast, listening to Pandora and placing phone calls at will, admittedly along the freeways/interstates, and I don't recall coverage problems.Oh yes, and we've saved quite a bit of $ over our previous plan(s) in the process. Consider that we rely on cell phones exclusively for communication... we dumped our landline years ago...we get more cellular data than we need, both lines together cost under $30 total, it's beyond me why anyone would voluntarily pay more! After all, a phone call is a phone call, a MB is a MB regardless of which carrier supplies it. It's the same!

i hate cricket wireless with a passion. they constantly double charge their customers for months of service and refuse to give refunds under any circumstances. tello was quick with porting a phone number im sentimentally attached to, only $25 for unlimited that cricket was charging me $50 for, and they don't double charge your account when using a debit card. eSim makes things super quick, didn't have to worry about waiting for a physical sim to show up in the mail. my agent that helped me port over my number, Nicole, was amazing and quick. Will be reccommending this service to all my phone-geek friends.
Give Tello a try, you won't be disappointed. The service, the cost and customer service are unbeatable. You may also be able to use your own phone, so check it out.

Review.Titre: The SIM card came quickly and was easy…

Review.Titre: Tello's new rates for the unlimited…
Review.Contenu: Tello's new rates for the unlimited data plan and their considerable increase of GBs on the plan were an unexpected surprise and so very welcome. Because my budget does not justify investing in home internet service (I'm not even sure it's available where I live but, if it is, I'm sure it's not cheap), I depend on my Tello account for all communication with the outside world.  Not surprisingly, it is easy to use up the data. But Tello's increase of data and decrease on price really means a lot. As important, it also demonstrates that Tello appreciates our business and desires to cultivate loyal customers. We could be cynical and point out that there's stiff competition among providers and so chalk up Tello's business move to no more than an effort to remain solvent. But I think Tello should be commended for--and feel good about--the approach to solvency they have chosen. They already have very good pricing and very good customer service. They didn't have to make this move to keep my business.  I'm grateful.

Concurrently, a mobile app is also conveniently available.I personally searched and compared several providers in the nation, and, indubitably Tello took the palm by far. Look and try it for yourself, beside my humble and personal opinion.A plethora of options in all plans that comes freely with zero(0) additional fees.If you do care about that flexibility and for saving accordingly, please, honestly check Tello out. You'll rejoice with the service as I do, unequivocally.Cheers

Review.Titre: Tello- Not Too Good To Be True!
Review.Contenu: I was an AT&T customer for more than 20 years. I have nothing bad to say about them at all but due to a drastic reduction in our finances we could no longer afford them. After researching we decided to try Tello. My thoughts were that with such great prices their service must be a dud. Boy, was I wrong! From the very first, my every experience with them has been an A++. I needed a new Sim card-they told me how. I wanted to import my number-they helped me every step of the way. Every need has been efficiently and politely met. The service is great. I have zero complaints. And now they tell me that my data is being doubled with no price increase? Amazing! I had to make sure I understood correctly! Needless to say, I am one happy, satisfied customer!
Very satisfied with great serive provided

Review.Titre: Tello offers great prices for the…
Review.Contenu: Tello offers great prices for the packages selected by the users. Their service is also great.

Dependable service, boasting no drop calls or missed messages, whether it's for international or local calls.  Tello's user-friendly system allows almost anyone to change their SIM card and effortlessly port their existing number to the Tello service.

And I just found out that my 1G of data for $10/mo. has been adjusted to 2G of data for the exact same price of $10 plus tax (of course) starting with my next month. That gives me a bit of "breathing room", not that I needed it, but it is nice to have if I ever do need it. Yay for Tello!

I was left with a wonderful feeling this Thanksgiving weekend. We will definitely stay with this company for many more years to come!
